srm_component

A node in the design tree hierarchy.

A component represents a node in the design hierarchy.  Leaf nodes are specialized version of this class representing register or register array.

The design hierarchy is an access path for the testwriter to select a component.  A design heierarchy can support multiple address map ie the components can have different offsets depending on the address map.

Summary
srm_component
A node in the design tree hierarchy.

Initialization

new

function new( string  name,
srm_component  parent )

Create a new instance of node with a pointer to parent.

Introspection

get_parent

function srm_component get_parent()

Return the parent of the node.

get_name

function string get_name()

Return the name of the node.

get_full_name

function string get_full_name()

Return the full hierarical path of the node.

Tree traversal

is_leaf_node

function bit is_leaf_node()

Return true if the node is a leaf node.

is_root_node

function bit is_root_node()

Return true if the node is a root node.

add_child

function void add_child( srm_component  child )

Add a child below itself.

number of children

Return the number of children of the node.

get_children

function void get_children( ref  srm_component  children[$] )

Return array of children of the node.

get_root_node

function srm_component get_root_node()

Return the root node of the tree.

get_leaf_nodes

function void get_leaf_nodes( ref  srm_component  leaves[$] )

Recursively find all the leaf nodes below itself.

Address Computation

set_offset

virtual function void set_offset( string  addr_map_name,
srm_addr_t  offset )

Set the offset of the node in the address map.

addr_map_name specifies the address map name.

offset specifies the offset in the address map.  A single node may belong to multiple address maps at different offsets.

get_offset

virtual function srm_addr_t get_offset( string  addr_map_name )

Return the offset of node in address map by adding all the offset in path.

addr_map_name specifies the address map to use.  Walks up the tree from the current node to the root, adding all the offset.  If address map name does not exists, then it is a fatal error.

set_size

virtual function void set_size( string  addr_map_name,
srm_addr_t  size )

Set the size of the node in bytes for the address map.

addr_map_name is the address map name.

size is the software address map size of the node.

The size allocated by sofware can be larger than the actual physical size of the node.

get_size

virtual function srm_addr_t get_size( string  addr_map_name )

Return the number of bytes occupied by the node in the address space.

Overriden by register to return the size of the entry.  For register array it returns the (size of the entry * number of entries).  For non leaf nodes, it returns the sum of the sizes of its children.

addr_map_name is the address map name.

The function recursively searches for the child that is the last in the address space.  The last address occupied will give the total address space occupied by the node.

address_2_instance

virtual function srm_component address_2_instance( string  addr_map_name,
srm_addr_t  addr )

Get the instance of the node given the address.  addr_map_name is the address map to be used.  addr is the address to be converted.

Adapter Management

add_adapter

virtual function void add_adapter( srm_bus_adapter  adapter )

Add the adapter to the list.

Each node maintains a list of adapters.  Depending on the policy one of the adapters is selected and the leaf node is accessed.

get_adapters

virtual function srm_adapters_t get_adapters()

Return the list of adapters at this node.

Composite Commands

load

virtual task load( srm_base_handle  handle )

Call load on all the leaf nodes of the tree.

The leaf node will actually call the read and update the model.

store

virtual task store( srm_base_handle  handle )

Call store on all the leaf nodes of the tree.

The leaf node will actually call write and update the design.

store_update

virtual task store_update( srm_base_handle  handle,
const ref  srm_component  node,
bit  skip_duplicate )

Call store_update on all the children of the node.

set_policy

virtual function void set_policy( string  addr_map_name,
srm_base_field_policy  policy )

Sets the policy on all the child nodes.

reset

virtual function void reset( string  kind )

Reset all the leaf nodes.

Leaf nodes implement the base case.

Model Update

predictor_update

virtual function void predictor_update( const ref  srm_generic_xact_t  xact )

Update the component due to the bus transaction.

For passive operation the predictor component converts the bus transaction to generic transaction.  This function updates the model with this transaction.

Observer Interface

attach

virtual function void attach( srm_base_coverage  observer )

Attach an observer to all the leaf nodes.

No reason for non leaf nodes to detect a read/write.

detach

virtual function void detach( srm_base_coverage  observer )

Detach all the instances of the observer from leaves.

detach_all

virtual function void detach_all()

Detach all the the coverage callbacks

get_num_coverage_cbs

virtual function int get_num_coverage_cbs()

Returns the number of coverage callbacks on the node.
